channel.title: I have a question please help
channel.description:
k im using pimpscape source
how do i add my server name on the top of the screen and have it stay there wiht out going off when i walk or what ever can someone give me the code for it please
and also i want to know how to add a restarter thing so it restarts my server every 30 minutes and how do i add the count down timer to the top of the screen under the name of my server
thanks and please help [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 07:45:14 pm[/size][hr]can anyone help me with this sorry for re posting
